note.p: Birth: Wotton-under-Edge, Gloucestershire, England (17 April 1748)
Death: The house of his friend Berthollet (a renowned chemist), at Arcueil, near Paris, France (26 March 1820)
Research Field: Physical chemistry
Education: MD (1768, Edinburgh)
Career: Medical Officer in the Army (until 1814); Secretary of the Royal Society (1784-1797); friend of Sir Joseph Banks
Honours: Kt c 1793
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 25/06/1772
Medals/Prizes: Copley Medal 1788
Council: Sec 1784-1797
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB
